item.title: Trump Commerce Secretary Lutnick Confident Of Sealing ‘Great’ EU Trade Deal, Calls August 1 ‘Hard Deadline’
item.description: Earlier this month, Trump threatened 30% levies on imports from the EU in a letter to the European Commission President, Ursula von der Leyen.

item.title: GlucoTrack, Sarepta, TNF Pharma Dominate Weekly Retail Health Care Buzz — Here’s Why

item.title: China's Rare Earth Exports To US Rise In June — But Retail Traders Feel It Doesn’t Change Things Much For American Miners
item.description: Chinese exports of the rare earth magnets jumped to 353 metric tons in June, up from a paltry 46 tons in May.

item.title: Nifty At Inflection Point: SEBI RAs Watch 24,900–25,000 For Reversal Or Breakdown
item.description: The Nifty closed below its 50-DMA for the first time in two months. Q1 earnings from key index heavyweights are expected to drive Monday's direction.
